name: Sunshine Mustard Anarkali Set
description: A radiant mustard yellow Anarkali suit with mirror work and a floral printed dupatta, perfect for daytime wedding functions.
stylistNotes: Pair it with oxidized jhumkas and juttis for a vibrant haldi or mehendi look.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Royal Plum Embroidered Anarkali
description: Deep plum georgette Anarkali with heavy embroidery on yoke and borders. Includes matching embroidered dupatta.
stylistNotes: Ideal for receptions and night functions. Style with kundan jewelry and soft curls.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Iron with care on reverse side.

name: Golden Mustard Silk Anarkali
description: Elegant mustard silk Anarkali with wide zari border and a contrasting deep green dupatta.
stylistNotes: Perfect for sangeet or festive events. Pair with traditional gold earrings and bangles.
materialCare: Steam iron only. Use garment bag when storing.

name: Ivory Mirror Work Anarkali
description: Ivory white designer Anarkali set featuring all-over mirror embroidery and a scalloped dupatta.
stylistNotes: Ideal for bridesmaids or wedding guests. Style with a potli bag and mojaris.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Avoid folding at embellishment lines.

name: Berry Draped Fusion Saree
description: Stylish magenta pre-draped saree with embroidered crop top and sheer dupatta. Light and easy to wear.
stylistNotes: Pair with oxidized silver earrings or colorful jhumkas for a festive vibe.
materialCare: Hand wash or dry clean. Store folded.

name: Emerald Glam Lehenga
description: Deep green velvet lehenga with heavy gold floral embroidery and V-neck blouse.
stylistNotes: Add kundan or polki earrings. Ideal for evening functions.
materialCare: Steam only. Store with desiccants. Dry clean preferred.

name: Olive Bloom Sharara Set
description: Playful olive green sharara set with floral embroidery and sheer dupatta. Contemporary and stylish.
stylistNotes: Wear pearl hoops or floral studs. Keep hairstyle bouncy and fresh.
materialCare: Mild detergent hand wash or dry clean. Iron inside-out.

name: Midnight Garden Peplum Set
description: Bottle green peplum kurta and flared skirt with vibrant floral prints. Breezy and charming.
stylistNotes: Pair with jhumkas or stone studs. Best for haldi/mehendi events.
materialCare: Machine wash cold. Line dry. Iron on reverse.

name: Mint Garden Lace Gown
description: A romantic mint green full-length gown featuring delicate embroidery and a sheer bolero-style overlay. Ideal for garden-themed or fairy-tale inspired weddings.
stylistNotes: Pair with silver or crystal chandelier earrings and a vintage clutch.

name: Orchid Embroidered Net Gown
description: Lavender-toned gown with intricate 3D floral embroidery. Elegant, classy and perfect for receptions or evening events.
stylistNotes: Looks great with pearl drop earrings or floral studs for a soft look.

name: Rose Ruffle Gown
description: Dusty rose off-shoulder gown with dramatic pleated ruffles and floral waist detail. Feminine and grand.

name: Peacock Mirror Work Lehenga
description: Heavy pastel bridal lehenga with mirror work, peacock motifs, and thread embroidery. Features a sleeveless blouse and scalloped dupatta.
stylistNotes: Perfect with kundan earrings and pastel bangles for a luxe look.

name: Champagne Sparkle Cape Gown
description: Champagne golden shimmer gown with attached cape sleeves for an elegant evening ensemble.

name: Geometric Bridal Cape Lehenga
description: Shimmery geometric pattern lehenga with structured blouse and sheer cape sleeves, perfect for sangeet nights.

name: Dusty Rose Embroidered Lehenga
description: A dusty rose net lehenga with heavy zardozi and sequin work, giving off a royal and soft vibe.

name: Maroon Wedding Banarasi Saree
description: Rich maroon Banarasi saree with antique gold zari weaving, ideal for bridal functions.

name: Seashell Pearl Potli
description: A chic half-moon potli bag made from natural jute, adorned with oversized pearls and charming sea shell charms, ideal for beachside or boho weddings.

name: Emerald Floral Velvet Potli
description: Rich velvet drawstring potli in deep emerald, embroidered with gold and white florals, pearl handles giving it a regal finish.
stylistNotes: Perfect with silk sarees and royal bridal outfits. Statement piece for night events.

name: Champagne Beaded Potli
description: Elegant champagne potli embellished with intricate golden threadwork, kundan beads and pearls.
stylistNotes: Adds a royal flair to engagement or reception wear. Complements neutral or golden tones.

name: Golden Mirror Embellished Potli
description: Statement potli with intricate mirror work and golden embroidery, complete with pearl tassels and structured handle.
stylistNotes: Suits bridal wear and sangeet outfits with shimmer or sequins.

name: Ivory Sequin Potli
description: Minimal yet festive ivory potli with scattered sequins and geometric embroidered base, matched with beaded tassels.
stylistNotes: Great for day events and bridesmaids. Works with pastel or ivory lehengas.

name: Vintage Floral Brocade Potli
description: Traditional brocade potli in green and pink tones, pearl handle and layered fringe tassels giving it a vintage royal touch.
stylistNotes: Perfect with Banarasi sarees and traditional lehengas.

name: Antique Tassel Gota Potli
description: Metallic shaded potli with heavy gota work, layered gold coin embellishments, and designer tassels.
stylistNotes: Bold choice for mehendi or haldi. Matches gold-embroidered or metallic outfits.

name: Mirror Work Bridal Potli
description: Dome-shaped bridal potli decked with reflective mirror work, sequins, and beaded tassels — true statement accessory.
stylistNotes: Goes best with lehengas having mirror work or sequins. Great for brides.
materialCare: Wipe with dry cloth. Do not fold or press hard.

name: Red Banarasi Potli
description: Rich Banarasi fabric potli with intricate gold zari motifs, finished with beaded lace and gold cords.
stylistNotes: A classic for brides or traditional events. Pair with red or golden ethnic outfits.
materialCare: Dry clean only. Avoid contact with water or perfume.

name: Gold Leaf Pearl Bangle Trio
description: Set of three gold-plated bangles, each decorated with delicate leaf motifs filled with pearlescent stones, creating a refined vintage appeal.
stylistNotes: Mix and match with other pastel or pearl sets. Ideal for Mehendi or sangeet functions.
materialCare: Gold-tone alloy with faux pearl stones. Store individually to avoid scratches; wipe clean with a jewelry cloth.

name: Pearl-Encrusted Wide Gold Cuff Set
description: Wide gold-plated cuff bangles richly encrusted with teardrop-shaped faux kundan and surrounded by a fringe of creamy pearl beads.
stylistNotes: Bold and opulent—best suited for grand weddings or a bride’s entry look.
materialCare: Gold alloy with kundan-style glass and faux pearls. Handle carefully, store flat, and keep pearls from abrasion.

name: Pastel Beaded Bridal Bangle Set
description: A luxurious bridal bangle set featuring pastel pink and mint enamel accents, interspersed with gold-plated bands and delicate pearl clusters at both ends.
stylistNotes: Perfect for light-colored bridal outfits or pastel lehengas. The combination of soft colors and classic pearls brings an elegant yet fresh look.
materialCare: Gold-plated alloy with glass pearls and enamel. Avoid water, store separately in a soft pouch to prevent enamel scratches.
size: Standard diameter 2.5" – fits most adult wrists. One size.

name: Gold Crystal-Studded Indian Bridal Chooda
description: A rich bridal chooda-style bangle set in antique gold plating, featuring multi-layered crystal embellishments and two jhumka-style danglers.
stylistNotes: Classic statement set for red/cream/ivory lehengas or sarees. The dangler adds luxurious movement and shine.
materialCare: Gold-tone metal with clear Austrian crystals. Wipe gently after use, avoid exposure to perfume or water.
size: Standard size – approximately 2.6" diameter, may require Indian bridal saree bangle sizing.

name: Royal Kundan Bridal Bangles
description: Luxurious bridal bangles featuring layers of Kundan work, pearls, and intricate gold detailing, complete with jhumki danglers at the ends.
stylistNotes: Ideal for bridal looks, especially with red, maroon or ivory lehengas. Adds grandeur and elegance.
materialCare: Store in a soft cloth pouch. Avoid contact with water or perfumes.

name: Kundan Pearl Bridal Bangle Set
description: Elegant gold-plated bangle set encrusted with kundan-style glass stones and bordered with small off-white pearls, finished with a central jhumka charm.
stylistNotes: Works beautifully as bridal or festive wristwear. Ideal with ivory, cream, or blush ensembles—gives a royal heritage flair.
materialCare: Gold-plated brass with kundan stones and faux pearls. Store flat and wipe with a soft dry cloth post-wear.
size: Standard – fits 2.5" wrist; bangles are individually sized.

name: Floral Pearl Bridal Wristpiece
description: Delicate wristpiece featuring small floral motifs in blush opal resin, interspersed with tiny crystal accents on a gold-tone chain.
stylistNotes: An elegant standalone or paired with bangles. Ideal for brides who want a subtle, refined sparkle.
materialCare: Gold-alloy base with resin and cubic zirconia. Avoid moisture and perfume; store in a zip-pouch to prevent chain tangling.
size: Adjustable length: from 6.5" to 8" via extension chain.

name: Silver Leaf Crystal Bridal Bracelet
description: A refined silver-tone bracelet adorned with leaf-shaped and round-cut clear crystals arranged in a vine pattern.
stylistNotes: Perfect complement to modern bridal gowns or Indo-western outfits seeking icy brilliance.
materialCare: Silver-plated brass with cubic zirconia. Clean with a soft cloth, avoid humidity. Keep in anti-tarnish pouch.

name: Green-Enamel Pearl Chandbali Drop Earrings
description: Statement chandelier-style earrings featuring a green-enamelled crescent motif, bordered with tear-drop kundan and dangling clusters of pearls and jade-green beads.
stylistNotes: Ideal bridal earrings for reception or traditional functions, pairs well with green, ivory, or pastel outfits.
materialCare: Gold-tone metal with enamel, kundan, jade-tone resin, and faux pearls. Gold plating may wear – avoid water.
size: Approx. 3" length from ear post to tassel.

name: Pink‑Orange Beaded Jhumka Set
description: Elaborate jhumka earrings in antique gold tone, adorned with pink, orange & white beads and pearls. Features intricate kundan detailing and long beaded tassels.
stylistNotes: Bold statement pieces perfect for lehengas or wedding gowns—adds vibrant color and movement.
materialCare: Avoid water, perfumes & hairspray. Gently wipe with soft cloth. Store padded and separately.
size: Length 14 cm (including tassels) x Width 5.5 cm

name: Multicolor Chandbali Pearl Earrings
description: Elegant chandbali earrings embedded with colorful beads and white pearls, perfect for weddings and festive occasions.
stylistNotes: Pair these with a plain silk lehenga to let the earrings be the statement piece.
materialCare: Keep in a cool dry place. Avoid direct contact with perfumes or water.

name: Pastel Mint‑Pink Meenakari Chand
description: Gold-tone chand earrings with soft pastel mint and pink enamel (meenakari), embellished with kundan stones, white pearls and pink beads. Elegant yet cheerful.
stylistNotes: Ideal for daytime receptions and engagement ceremonies—pairs well with pastel lehenga or silk saree.
materialCare: Clean gently with dry cloth; keep away from humidity and chemicals.

name: Kundan & Emerald Hair Chain Earrings
description: Traditional Kundan jhumka earrings with attached hair chain featuring multiple pearl strands and green bead drops.
stylistNotes: Best worn with a low-bun or braid hairstyle for Mehendi or Sangeet functions.
materialCare: Store separately to avoid scratches. Wipe after use with a soft cloth.

name: Antique Temple Coin Jhumka
description: Antique finish jhumkas with multi-layered coin and pearl chain detailing. South Indian inspired design.

name: Blush Pink Pearl Chandbalis
description: Romantic blush pink earrings with soft pearls and crystal stones. Lightweight yet bold in presence.

name: Black & Mirror Statement Chandbalis

name: Floral Kundan Pearl Jhumkas

name: Kundan Dome Jhumka Set
